name: issue_certificate
attributes: # [doc = " 証明書発行：メタデータと受取人を受け取り、初期フィールドだけ設定"]
body: let cert = & mut ctx . accounts . certificate ;
cert . issuer = ctx . accounts . issuer . key () ;
cert . bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("certificate") . unwrap () ;
cert . recipient = ctx . accounts . recipient . key () ;
let now = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: verify_certificate
attributes: # [doc = " 証明書検証：最後の検証時刻を更新"]
body: let cert = & mut ctx . accounts . certificate ;
cert . last_action_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

name: revoke_certificate
attributes: # [doc = " 証明書失効：is_revoked を立て、時刻を更新"]
body: let cert = & mut ctx . accounts . certificate ;
cert . last_action_ts = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: certificate
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ゼロクリア後、必要フィールドだけ設定"] # [account (init_zeroed , payer = issuer , seeds = [b"certificate" , issuer . key () . as_ref () , & cert_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 8 + 32 + 4 + 100 + 1 + 8 + 8)]

fields.name: issuer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 証明書発行者（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: recipient
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 証明書受取人（キーだけ必要なため未チェックアカウント）"]

fields.name: certificate
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の証明書（PDA 検証 + オーナーチェック）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"certificate" , certificate . issuer . as_ref () , & certificate . cert_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = certificate . bump , has_one = issuer)]

fields.name: issuer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 証明書発行者（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]
